definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: usu. of man, always with wife of another; c. acc. woman, Le 20:10, Le 20:10 (H), Pr 6:32; elsewh. abs. Ex 20:14 = De 5:17 (Ten Words), Je 5:7, Je 7:9, Je 23:14, Ho 4:2; pt. m. Le 20:10 (H), Job 24:15.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of women, only pt. Le 20:10 (H), Ez Eze 16:38, Eze 23:45, Eze 23:45.
fig. of idolatrous worship, [[את האבן ואת העץ]] Je 3:9.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of man, c. acc. woman, Je 29:23; abs. Ez Eze 23:37; pt pl. Je 9:2, Je 23:10, Ho 7:4, Mal 3:5, Ps 50:18.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of woman, abs. Ho 4:13, Ho 4:14; pt. Ho 3:1 Pr 30:20; pl. Ez Eze 16:32.
fig. of idolatrous worship, [[אֶת־גִּלּוּלֵיהֶם]] Ez Eze 23:37; abs. Je 3:8, [[זֶאֶרַע]] [[מְנׇאֵף]] Is 57:3.
